column5: Anyone ever fish Twin Sisters Lake near Marmora or Mitchell Lake near Kirkfield ?  Thinking of trying one but can't decide which one.
What do ya want to know about them. I have fished both.
I was just wondering if you had a choice , for bass, what one would you fish.

Hi Hutch, I was fishing on Mitchell last Sunday. It's pretty shallow lake. Fishing was good, we got a lot of fish(pike, bass), but all small size. I was their first time. A lot of small pike(less than 1 lb), got a 4 largemouth, biggest was around 2 lb.
Thanks for the report.  Anyone fish Twin Sisters for bass ? How was your luck?
